name: Unity Project 9 - 3 Clones in 1
description:
3 Classics (Clones) in one game, what a deal!

P□ng (A Pong Clone)

Move the paddle with the W & S keys or the UP & DOWN Arrow Keys to hit the ball. (Player 2 uses the I & K keys) (Android: Tap Anywhere, 2-Player: Tap your side of the screen)

Flappy Square (A Flappy Bird Clone)

Press SPACE to Jump, dodge obstacles and score points. (Android: Tap Anywhere)

Pac-Square (A Pac-Man Clone)

Use the WASD keys or the Arrow Keys to move. (Android: Joystick)

Eat to score points. Eating powerups allow the player to eat the ghosts and score points too.
